modName: Razor Scales Armor and Cannibal Lord Mask HD
summary:
Razor Scales Armor and Cannibal Lord Mask by: ZeroFrost 
reuploaded to skyrim nexus. Because of all the requests ZeroFrost has given me the permission to reupload this.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]DtfuRK9l074[/youtube][youtube]8nEuNXRuloY[/youtube][/center]

The Razor Scales Armor and Cannibal Lord Mask HD retexture made by ZeroFrost is now back on skyrim nexus. ZeroFrost has granted me the permission to reupload the rest of his work. This mod is a high resolution re-texture of the Nord Steel Plate Armor and of the Morokei mask (Found durring the mage college main quest). ZeroFrost designed this armor primarily for male charachters because he viewed that duplicating the process for the female version is ironically a turn off. But now that its back everyone can enjoy this retexture once again.
author: AncientVampire and ZeroFrost
